snippet.title: Olympic Park tour part of grand day of sightseeing
snippet.description: SOCHI -- Good afternoon from the 2014 Summer Olympics! I kid, but the weather continues to be paradise-esque in Sochi. We read about lots of dreary, rainy weather in the days leading up to the start of the 2014 Sochi Olympics, but to this point it has been a lot of sunshine and temperatures that feel more like May than February. On Wednesday, I had some time before the hockey games started...
